description: Rikuo was desperate to go Kyouto to save Yura and revenge the death of his father, that`s why Nurarihyon leaves no choice but to sent his Grandson at Tono Village to trained him and improve his power to the next level, because he will never defeat Hagoromo-Gitsune in his current ability and worst, he might die by only going at Kyouto. In the village, he met new friends that helped him discover his own self as a powerful youkai nurarihyon.
